name: Weapon Meister
description:
The plot of Weapon Meister takes you back to 200 years before the grim events of the game Unferat where the player took on the role of the villainous Necromancer.

This time you are offered the opposite role and play as a recruit of the holy Order confronting the first Necromancer and his evil horde.
Moving from field to field, you will collect skill cards, combine them, upgrade your weapons, trade and master the talent system.
Hordes of enemies will stand in your way!
The living dead with unique characteristics and skills!
Fast and ruthless robbers! Warding magic monoliths! Cultists using dark magic!

Greed and hastiness will inevitably result in defeat.
Learn to use the strengths of each weapon and create deadly fighting combos!
Declare that strategy is worth more than numerical advantage, then prove it on the battlefield!
